Description: Fragment of neck and oval handle of a Rhodian pottery transport amphora. Clay fine red-brown; cream slip. Rectangular stamp.
Curator's comments: Ink, deleted, '81̣'. Name Aristeidas. From same die as Alexandria, Greco-Roman Museum, ABC 0068.29.
Bibliographic references: Stoddart 1847 / Memoir on the inscribed pottery of Rhodes, Cnidus and other Greek Cities (63)
